name: vinq-crm
description: VinQ CRM - Zoho Style CRM for Real Estate

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.vercel-build: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: VinQ Team
